rooms.description: A traditional Kerala-style entrance hall with natural stone flooring, open to the garden.
Spacious living area with high ceiling and large windows oriented towards east for Vastu harmony.
Dining space adjacent to the kitchen, allowing seamless flow between dining and cooking areas.
Open-plan kitchen designed with ample storage and counter space. Features north-east placement for positive energy per Vastu guidelines.
Small utility area including laundry and storage, placed away from main living spaces to maintain privacy.
Connected to the ground floor suite with traditional Kerala-style fixtures, ensuring proper ventilation.

openings.description: Large windows designed to maximize natural light, oriented towards the east in accordance with Vastu principles.
